Go to https://staging.new.expensify.com/home (login new gmail account) 2. Open a self DM chat 3. Enter > ga 4. Send the message 5. Long press the message sent and select copy to clipboard 6. Paste the test in compose box 7. Tap plus icon next to chat input 8. Tap create expense 9. Enter an amount and tap next 10.
